notes.text: We now provide an option to display a custom message in the message strip above the list report table
We now correctly set the focus on the field that corresponds to the message used in the messageButton menu
When navigating to an ObjectPage that has LongRunners requests, we now ensure that no data from previous contexts is displayed
When navigating from an object page to a subobject page, the focus is now correctly set on the erroneous field when a user clicks on the ActiveTitle in the message popover
We now provide a message strip in the header of an object page to notify about available messages
The link in the MessagePopover is now disabled when the backend error is on a table row not loaded
We no longer display a clickable link in the message dialog if the error occurs in a hidden column of a table in an object page for which no navigation is configured
The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
